mapper.select: SELECT B.*, count(R.replyID) as replyCount FROM frankly.Board B LEFT JOIN frankly.Reply R ON B.boardID = R.boardID WHERE B.boardID = #{boardID} GROUP BY B.boardID
SELECT *, count(R.replyID) as replyCount FROM frankly.Board B LEFT JOIN frankly.Reply R ON B.boardID = R.boardID WHERE B.userID = #{userID} GROUP BY B.boardID
SELECT *, count(R.replyID) as replyCount FROM frankly.Board B LEFT JOIN frankly.Reply R ON B.boardID = R.boardID WHERE R.userID = #{userID} GROUP BY R.replyID
SELECT B.*, count(R.replyID) as replyCount FROM frankly.Board B LEFT JOIN frankly.Reply R ON B.boardID = R.boardID WHERE B.region = #{region} GROUP BY B.boardID ORDER BY B.boardID DESC
SELECT B.*, count(R.replyID) as replyCount FROM frankly.Board B LEFT JOIN frankly.Reply R ON B.boardID = R.boardID WHERE B.marked > 10 GROUP BY B.boardID ORDER BY B.boardID DESC

SELECT * FROM frankly.Board WHERE 1 = 1
AND title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND userID LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY boardID DESC
